long_description: The Coleman Personal Survival First-Aid Tin includes 74 essential items you might need while backpacking, including bandages, waterproof matches, sting relief wipes and safety pins. Includes six 3 x 1 in. bandages, 6 small bandages, 4 butterfly bandages, 2 spot bandages, 2 knuckle bandages, 5 antiseptic wipes and 3 sting relief wipes. Also includes 1 large safety pin, 1 small safety pin, 2 antibiotic ointments, 40 waterproof matches, 1 razor blade and the reusable tin. Nostalgic brushed-metal tin has a hinged top; tin is crush-resistant to protect the contents. Embossed first-aid cross for easy identification in the dark.
short_description: The Coleman Personal Survival First-Aid Tin includes 74 essential items you might need while backpacking, including bandages, waterproof matches, sting relief wipes and safety pins.
